price: ඉබ්රාහීම්ගේ සම්භාවනීය ආගන්තුකයින්ගේ කතාව නුඹ වෙත පැමිණියේ ද?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Sinhalese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Sinhalese by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīthu ḍayfi ib'rāhīma al-muk'ramīna
